ygData.subject: Introducing Redhot (New character)
ygData.msgSnippet: The pain..it was all he could feel before his sensors cut it off. He leaked mech fluid from several wounds sustained in battle. A battle he barely survived.

Subject: Introducing Redhot (New character)
Message-ID: <9fl2si+sk9b@...>
User-Agent: eGroups-EW/0.82
MIME-Version: 1.0
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1
Content-Length: 1117
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: "Northlight" <domnijoeproductions2001@...>

    The pain..it was all he could feel before his sensors cut it off. 
He leaked mech fluid from several wounds sustained in battle. A
battle 
he barely survived. His mind ached from the effort of keeping himself 
conscious and several times his mind faded into near darkness.
Through 
squinted, unfocused eyes he checked his insignia. Was it Autobot or 
was it Decepticon? He couldn't remeber if he changed it. He couldn't 
remeber anything. He barely remebered how he got to his present 
location, just that it must have been by the aid of Primus. It was a 
fog in his memmory. Or was it like a cloud, which he very much liked 
to...
    He gasped and feebily tried to get up, only to collapse in at an 
angle, one of his tattered wings keeping him stable. His chest ached 
and he weakly tried to contain the bleeding from it. He needed help. 
He tried three times to open a com link, faintly remebered something 
about Autobots. With one last valliant effort he forced out a
distress 
call. He prayed someone heared it.

*********************************

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

************************
